name: io.github.aybelatchane/mcp-server-terminal
description: MCP server for AI agents to interact with terminal applications. Think Playwright for terminals.

packageArguments.description: Run in headless mode without spawning visible terminal windows
packageArguments.name: --headless

environmentVariables.description: X11 display for visual mode (Linux/WSL). Example: :0
environmentVariables.name: DISPLAY

environmentVariables.description: Logging level: error, warn, info, debug, trace
environmentVariables.name: RUST_LOG
